channel.title: Comments on: Kuri’s Co-Founder and CTO at SXSW 2018
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Jennifer
item.dc:creator: Jennifer
item.description: Hi Scott! We don't have any more scheduled appearances with Kuri at SXSW. However, we may be bringing him along to cool spots, so be sure to follow Kuri on Twitter and Instagram to catch his latest whereabouts! His handle is @KuriRobot. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi Scott! We don’t have any more scheduled appearances with Kuri at SXSW. However, we may be bringing him along to cool spots, so be sure to follow Kuri on Twitter and Instagram to catch his latest whereabouts! His handle is @KuriRobot. Thanks!

item.title: By: scott
item.dc:creator: scott
item.description: Where4 will Kuri et al be this week?
